articles.title: Adani Wilmar, other 19 stocks to be excluded from NSE's ASM framework from 26 Sept. Check list | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Adani Wilmar, Sadbhav Engineering, Dhampur Sugar Mills, and Siti Networks are among some of the stocks to exit the framework. ASM on securities with surveillance concerns is based on objective parameters like price, volume variation, volatility, etc.

articles.title: FPIs pump in Rs 8,600-crore in September; pace of investment slows - Moneycontrol
articles.description: FPIs turned net buyers in July after nine straight months of net outflows, which started in October last year.
